TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Paragraph extends System.Windows.Documents.Block

summary.span: 用于将内容分组到一个段落中的块级别流内容元素。

span.span: A block-level flow content element used to group content into a paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施强的内容模型为子内容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息内容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 纯文本格式，除了元素可以托管其他元素。In addition to plain text, a element can host other elements. 有效子元素包括：Valid child elements include: - - - - - - - - - - 请参阅[流文档概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)有关此对象可以包含的内容和内容可以包含详细信息。See [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md) for more information on what this object can contain and what can contain it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发您自己控件包含。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它包含应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 一个 集合，它包含应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 值为 表示不应用任何文本修饰。

span.span: A value of means no text decorations will be applied.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象是可以添加到文本的视觉装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建文本修饰](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 以下示例演示如何设置 的 属性。The following example shows how to set the property of a . [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_paragraph_textdecxaml)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_paragraph_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_paragraph_textdec)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： 具有默认删除线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "屏幕快照： 具有默认删除线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下图显示如何**上划线**，**基线**，并**用下划线标出**修饰的呈现效果，分别。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![屏幕快照： 上划线 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "屏幕快照： 上划线 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![屏幕快照： 默认基线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "屏幕快照： 的默认基线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![屏幕快照： 具有默认下划线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "屏幕快照： 具有默认下划线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect")
